definition: deficiency/deficit/luckily/it's lucky that.../(often ironically) fancy that...
responsible for its profit and losses (of organization)/financially autonomous/personal financial responsibility
responsible for its profit and losses (of organization)/financially autonomous/personal financial responsibility

sentences.english: This motivates them to give their all to their companies, whether they make money or not.
sentences.chinese: 这使得他们会不计盈亏的对公司竭心尽力。

sentences.english: So do the dual forces of the Tao wax and wane in the alternation of upward and downward cycles, intercrossing.
sentences.chinese: 在升降的交替中，道的盛衰盈亏两个力量也是如此。

sentences.english: All exchange differences are dealt with in the profit and loss account.
sentences.chinese: 所有汇兑盈亏均计入损益账内。

sentences.english: The fee is low, compared with that at many other in dependent schools.
sentences.chinese: 与其他自负盈亏的学校比较，这里的学费是低的。

sentences.english: They agreed to work on shares.
sentences.chinese: 他们同意合伙干，共负盈亏。

sentences.english: The analysis of profit and loss is a vital problem for business management decision.
sentences.chinese: 盈亏平衡分析是企业经营决策中的一个重要问题。

sentences.english: Title to the state-owned assets in the company shall vest in the State.
sentences.chinese: 公司以其全部法人财产，依法自主经营，自负盈亏。

sentences.english: The market does just that with its profits and losses.
sentences.chinese: 市场正是以盈亏来做到这一点的。

sentences.english: It is very important, that the responsible persons are present during this inspection.
sentences.chinese: 自负盈亏的公司负责人在检查中亲临现场是必要的。

sentences.english: Self-financial programme students are not entitled to the University hostel facilities.
sentences.chinese: 自付盈亏课程学生不符合申请大学宿舍资格。

sentences.english: We expect Huadian to record loss in FY10 and breakeven in FY11.
sentences.chinese: 我们预计华电10年将亏损，11年盈亏平衡。

sentences.english: In consideration of this, the author holds that to calculate net present value break-even point is necessary.
sentences.chinese: 鉴于此，笔者认为有必要计算现值盈亏平衡点。

sentences.english: Solar activity waxes and wanes according to approximately 11-year cycles.
sentences.chinese: 太阳活动的盈亏周期大约是11年。

sentences.english: Life is their own profits and losses.
Estimate of capital reinvestment and its profit and loss.
sentences.chinese: 资金之转投资及其盈亏之估计。

sentences.english: ZYX is trading above the breakeven point.
sentences.chinese: ZYX交易价高于盈亏平衡点。

definition: responsible for its profit and losses (of organization)/financially autonomous/personal financial responsibility
market price/quotation of market price/the current market situation
gains and losses/success and failure/merits and demerits
stop-loss point, a point at which you make a small loss to limit your losses
